医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
住在绿色空间附近是否有助于缓解幼儿期的焦虑和抑郁？研究表明，住宅绿地面积的增加与 2 至 5 岁儿童焦虑和抑郁等内化症状的减少有关，这凸显了无障碍自然环境对儿童早期发展的潜在心理健康益处。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240412/Does-living-near-green-space-help-soothe-early-childhood-anxiety-and-depression.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240412/Does-living-near-green-space-help-soothe-early-childhood-anxiety-and-depression.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e990509f-458e-4fc7-9534-1ac1b43520a0 Fri, 12 Apr 2024 00:14:00 -0400 Does living near green space help soothe early childhood anxiety and depression?
合成数据能否提高医学成像人工智能的公平性？ 《自然医学》最近的一项研究表明，扩散模型如何通过使用合成数据增强训练数据集，提高医学机器学习模型在解释组织病理学、胸部 X 光和皮肤病学图像等医学图像时的鲁棒性和公平性，提高不同领域的准确性和公平性患者群体。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240411/Can-synthetic-data-boost-fairness-in-medical-imaging-AI.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240411/Can-synthetic-data-boost-fairness-in-medical-imaging-AI.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=cbbd7dfa-0553-45c3-995e-fe3a5c164086 Thu, 11 Apr 2024 23:59:00 -0400 Can synthetic data boost fairness in medical imaging AI?
我们吃的东西真的对我们有好处吗？对宏量营养素和慢性疾病的新见解该评论探讨了碳水化合物、蛋白质和脂肪等常量营养素对健康的影响，强调需要精确的饮食指导以有效管理和预防慢性疾病。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240411/Are-we-eating-whats-really-good-for-us-New-insights-into-macro Nutritions-and-chronic-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240411/Are-we-eating-whats-really-good-for-us-New-insights-into-macro Nutritions-and-chronic-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5495f99e-a57f-4fed-8b8f-e16783df9abc Thu, 11 Apr 2024 23:21:00 -0400 Are we eating what's really good for us? New insights into macronutrients and chronic disease
将生活方式与长寿联系起来：饮食和高血压如何影响心脏病和癌症的风险研究回顾了将饮食和高血压等可改变的危险因素与心血管疾病（CVD）和癌症联系起来的流行病学证据，提出了共同的病理生理学和同时预防和管理的潜在策略。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240411/Linking-lifestyle-to-longevity-How-diet-and-hypertension-sway-risks-for-heart-disease-and-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240411/Linking-lifestyle-to-longevity-How-diet-and-hypertension-sway-risks-for-heart-disease-and-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=abb61fa7-d8c3-42ce-8285-5c53f7d0cae6 Thu, 11 Apr 2024 23:06:00 -0400 Linking lifestyle to longevity: How diet and hypertension sway risks for heart disease and cancer
研究揭示糖尿病前期患者肠道微生物组的关键差异研究探索了糖尿病前期患者和健康个体之间肠道微生物组组成的差异，揭示了与代谢功能改变和潜在糖尿病进展相关的显着变化。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240411/Study-reveals-key-gut-microbiome-differences-in-prediabetic-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240411/Study-reveals-key-gut-microbiome-differences-in-prediabetic-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3582c804-fb54-460b-8d28-bd46aa94fa6b Thu, 11 Apr 2024 22:32:00 -0400 Study reveals key gut microbiome differences in prediabetic patients
怀孕期间地中海饮食与更健康的妈妈和婴儿有关系统评价和荟萃分析调查了怀孕期间地中海饮食对围产期健康的影响，显示出在减少妊娠糖尿病和改善出生结局方面的显着益处。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240411/Eating-Mediterranean-style-during-pregnancy-linked-to-healthier-moms-and-babies.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240411/Eating-Mediterranean-style-during-pregnancy-linked-to-healthier-moms-and-babies.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c36fb426-ed08-4988-be33-dbed45e34c19 Thu, 11 Apr 2024 20:34:00 -0400 Eating Mediterranean-style during pregnancy linked to healthier moms and babies
探索葫芦科植物的健康秘密：仔细观察葫芦科植物和苦瓜该评论调查了黄瓜和苦瓜植物对健康的影响，强调了它们由于富含生物活性化合物而在控制糖尿病、炎症和癌症方面的潜力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240411/Exploring-the-health-secrets-of-cucurbits-A-closer-look-at-Cucumis-and-Momordica.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240411/Exploring-the-health-secrets-of-cucurbits-A-closer-look-at-Cucumis-and-Momordica.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=944ab30f-6d9d-410a-b57a-f189fa238dae Thu, 11 Apr 2024 20:24:00 -0400 Exploring the health secrets of cucurbits: A closer look at Cucumis and Momordica
Metrion Biosciences 通过访问 Enamine 化合物库增强了高通量筛选服务https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240411/Metrion-Biosciences-enhances-High-Throughput-Screening-services-with-access-to-Enamine-compound-libraries.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240411/Metrion-Biosciences-enhances-High-Throughput-Screening-services-with-access-to-Enamine-compound-libraries.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b8b87c45-0c52-4c36-9614-2b37887d3630 Thu, 11 Apr 2024 06:31:00 -0400 Metrion Biosciences enhances High Throughput Screening services with access to Enamine compound libraries
事实证明，每年接种一次 COVID-19 疫苗对于个人健康和钱包来说是一项明智的投资研究发现，无论保险状况如何，每年接种一次 COVID-19 疫苗对个人来说在临床和经济上都是有益的，可以通过降低感染的可能性及其相关成本来节省开支。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240411/Annual-COVID-19-vaccine-proves-to-be-a-wise-investment-for-personal-health-and-pocketbook.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240411/Annual-COVID-19-vaccine-proves-to-be-a-wise-investment-for-personal-health-and-pocketbook.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1d21d608-65b3-49bb-a44a-b86134e978e7 Thu, 11 Apr 2024 01:50:00 -0400 Annual COVID-19 vaccine proves to be a wise investment for personal health and pocketbook
研究人员呼吁修改真菌优先列表以应对区域疾病负担研究批评世界卫生组织的真菌优先病原体清单没有完全反映真菌疾病的全球负担，主张修订清单，考虑区域差异并提高毛霉目和组织胞浆菌等病原体的优先顺序。更好地适应它们对公共卫生的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240411/Researchers-call-for-a-revamped-fungal-priority-list-to-combat-regional-disease-burdens.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240411/Researchers-call-for-a-revamped-fungal-priority-list-to-combat-regional-disease-burdens.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c8c86353-8a32-4c64-9d06-d873ae6c4fd9 Thu, 11 Apr 2024 01:35:00 -0400 Researchers call for a revamped fungal priority list to combat regional disease burdens
